00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     Small demo program to show how to connect to the ODB
00007 
00008   $Log: odb_test.c,v $
00009   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:10  mucap
00010   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00011   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00012 
00013   Revision 1.4  2004/01/08 08:40:08  midas
00014   Implemented standard indentation
00015 
00016   Revision 1.3  2002/05/08 20:51:41  midas

00018 
00019   Revision 1.2  1998/10/12 12:18:58  midas
00020   Added Log tag in header
00021 
00022 
00023 \********************************************************************/
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include "midas.h"
00028 
00029 int run_number;
00030 
00031 void run_number_changed(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hKey, void *info)
00032 {
00033    printf("New run number: %d\n", run_number);
00034 }
00035 
00036 main()
00037 {
00038    int status, size;
00039    HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00040 
00041    /* connect to experiment */
00042    status = cm_connect_experiment("", "", "ODBTest", NULL);
00043    if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00044       return 1;
00045 
00046    /* get handle to online database */
00047    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
00048 
00049    /* read key "runinfo/run number" */
00050    size = sizeof(run_number);
00051    status =
00052        db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/runinfo/run number", &run_number, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00053    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00054       printf("Cannot read run number");
00055       return 0;
00056    }
00057 
00058    printf("Current run number is %d\n", run_number);
00059 
00060    /* set new run number */
00061    run_number++;
00062    db_set_value(hDB, 0, "/runinfo/run number", &run_number, size, 1, TID_INT);
00063 
00064 
00065    /* now open run_number with automatic updates */
00066    db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/runinfo/run number", &hKey);
00067    db_open_record(hDB, hKey, &run_number, sizeof(run_number),
00068                   MODE_READ, run_number_changed, NULL);
00069 
00070    printf("Waiting for run number to change. Hit RETURN to abort\n");
00071 
00072    do {
00073       cm_yield(1000);
00074    } while (!ss_kbhit());
00075 
00076    db_close_record(hDB, hKey);
00077 
00078    /* disconnect from experiment */
00079    cm_disconnect_experiment();
00080 
00081    return 1;
00082 }
